flawed_nl_solution:
They sold $200 worth of cars each month because 4 x 50 = <<4*50=200>>200
They made $10 a month off cars because 200 - 100 = <<200-100=10>>10
They sold $400 worth of motorcycles each month because 8 x 50 = <<8*50=400>>400
They make $150 a month off motorcycles because 400 - 250 = <<400-250=150>>150
They make $140 more a month off motorcycles than cars because 150 - 10 = <<150-10=140>>140
#### 140

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 100, not 10. It appears a zero was dropped from the number.
